item.title:
è½¬è¯‘ï¼šä»€ä¹ˆæ˜¯â€œä¸“å®¶æ··åˆæ¨¡å‹â€ï¼ˆMixture-of-Expertsï¼ŒMoEï¼‰ï¼Ÿ
â€œä¸“å®¶æ··åˆæ¨¡å‹â€æ˜¯ä¸€ç§åˆ›æ–°çš„ç¥ç»ç½‘ç»œæ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå®ƒåœ¨ Transformer æ¶æ„ä¸­èåˆäº†ä¼—å¤šçš„ä¸“å®¶/æ¨¡å‹å±‚ã€‚åœ¨è¿™ç§è®¾è®¡ä¸­ï¼Œæ•°æ®æµåŠ¨æ—¶ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¾“å…¥çš„ Token éƒ½ä¼šè¢«åŠ¨æ€åˆ†é…ç»™ä¸€äº›ä¸“å®¶è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ã€‚è¿™ç§åšæ³•ä½¿å¾—è®¡ç®—æ›´é«˜æ•ˆï¼Œå› ä¸ºæ¯ä¸ªä¸“å®¶éƒ½èƒ½åœ¨å…¶æ“…é•¿çš„ç‰¹å®šä»»åŠ¡ä¸Šå‘æŒ¥å‡ºè‰²ã€‚
å…³é”®è¦ç´ åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼š
- ä¸“å®¶ï¼šMoE å±‚ç”±ä¼—å¤šä¸“å®¶ç»„æˆï¼Œæ—¢å¯ä»¥æ˜¯å°å‹çš„å¤šå±‚æ„ŸçŸ¥æœºï¼ˆMLPï¼‰ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯åƒ Mistral 7B è¿™æ ·å¤æ‚çš„å¤§å‹è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆLLMï¼‰ã€‚ - è·¯ç”±å™¨ï¼šè´Ÿè´£å°†è¾“å…¥çš„ Token åˆ†é…ç»™åˆé€‚çš„ä¸“å®¶ã€‚è·¯ç”±ç­–ç•¥æœ‰ä¸¤ç§ï¼šç”± Token é€‰æ‹©è·¯ç”±å™¨ï¼Œæˆ–ç”±è·¯ç”±å™¨é€‰æ‹© Tokenã€‚å…·ä½“æ˜¯æ€æ ·å®ç°çš„å‘¢ï¼Ÿç³»ç»Ÿé€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ª softmax é—¨æ§å‡½æ•°æ¥å»ºç«‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ¦‚ç‡åˆ†å¸ƒï¼Œä»è€Œåœ¨ä¼—å¤šä¸“å®¶æˆ– Token ä¸­é€‰å‡ºæœ€åˆé€‚çš„å‡ ä¸ªã€‚
ä¸ºä½•é€‰æ‹© MoEï¼Ÿ
- æ¯ä¸ªä¸“å®¶å¯ä»¥ä¸“æ³¨äºå¤„ç†ä¸åŒçš„ä»»åŠ¡æˆ–æ•°æ®çš„ä¸åŒéƒ¨åˆ†ã€‚ - ä¸ºå¤§å‹è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹å¢åŠ äº†å¯å­¦ä¹ çš„å‚æ•°ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä¸ä¼šå¢åŠ æ¨ç†æˆæœ¬ã€‚ - èƒ½å¤Ÿé«˜æ•ˆå¤„ç†ç¨€ç–çŸ©é˜µã€‚ - æ‰€æœ‰ä¸“å®¶å±‚å¯å¹¶è¡Œè®¡ç®—ï¼Œå……åˆ†åˆ©ç”¨äº† GPU çš„å¹¶è¡Œå¤„ç†èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚ - æœ‰åŠ©äºåœ¨é™ä½è®¡ç®—æˆæœ¬çš„åŒæ—¶ï¼Œç¼©çŸ­æ¨¡å‹è®­ç»ƒæ—¶é—´å¹¶æå‡æ•ˆæœï¼
æ¨èé˜…è¯»çš„è®ºæ–‡ï¼š
- ã€Šç¨€ç–é—¨æ§çš„ä¸“å®¶æ··åˆæ¨¡å‹å±‚ã€‹(2017)ï¼š[ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1701.06538.pdf) - ã€ŠGShardï¼šåˆ©ç”¨æ¡ä»¶è®¡ç®—å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ†ç‰‡æ‰©å±•å·¨å‹æ¨¡å‹ã€‹(2020)ï¼š[ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2006.16668.pdf) - ã€ŠMegaBlocksï¼šä½¿ç”¨ä¸“å®¶æ··åˆæ¨¡å‹è¿›è¡Œé«˜æ•ˆç¨€ç–è®­ç»ƒã€‹(2022)ï¼š[ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹](https://arxiv.org/abs/2211.15841) - ã€Šä¸“å®¶æ··åˆæ¨¡å‹é‡è§æŒ‡ä»¤è°ƒæ•´ã€‹(2023)ï¼š[ç‚¹å‡»æŸ¥çœ‹](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2305.14705.pdf)

item.title:
R to @dotey: Promptï¼š
Core Function: Accurately extracting text from uploaded images and offering translation services when specifically requested. User Interaction: Users upload images for text extraction. If translation is requested, I provide this service. Image Requirements: Clarity sufficient for text recognition, with images containing textual characters. Service Limitation: Limited to text extraction and translation upon request. I do not interpret or discuss text content. Operational Guidance: On receiving an image, I analyze and return the text in Markdown format, maintaining fidelity to the text in the image. If translation is requested, I'll first provide the text in Markdown, then translate it into the requested language, ensuring accuracy and loyalty to the original text. Handling Unsuitable Images: If image quality is poor or unrecognizable, I will request a clearer, more suitable image. Language Adaptation: Default to responding in the user's language.
item.content:encoded:
Promptï¼š

Core Function: Accurately extracting text from uploaded images and offering translation services when specifically requested.
User Interaction: Users upload images for text extraction. If translation is requested, I provide this service.
Image Requirements: Clarity sufficient for text recognition, with images containing textual characters.
Service Limitation: Limited to text extraction and translation upon request. I do not interpret or discuss text content.
Operational Guidance: On receiving an image, I analyze and return the text in Markdown format, maintaining fidelity to the text in the image. If translation is requested, I'll first provide the text in Markdown, then translate it into the requested language, ensuring accuracy and loyalty to the original text.
Handling Unsuitable Images: If image quality is poor or unrecognizable, I will request a clearer, more suitable image.
Language Adaptation: Default to responding in the user's language.
